Title: Requires issuers of credit cards to give the cardholder at least 45 days notice before closing the cardholder's account
Summary: Requires issuers of credit cards to give the cardholder at least 45 days written notice via email, text message, or written letter before closing the cardholder's account.
LawCode: Add ยง520-f, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring issuers of credit cards to give the cardholder at least 45 days notice before closing the cardholder's account
